outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
dataDirectory.comment: The base path for the directory to store hashrate history
miners.comment: An array of one or more miners

miners.minerlabel.comment: A unique label to give this miner. It is used as part of the filename and label on image.
miners.mineraddress.comment: (required) The ip or host address for your miner on your local lan, accessible from the host running the minerstatus script
miners.expectations.comment: An optional structure defining expectations to monitor for. A setting out of range will cause a warning to be rendered.

expectations.power.comment: An optional structure defining power expectations to monitor for

power.low.comment: An optional property to define the low end of expected power range, in watts
power.high.comment: An optional property to define the high end of expected power range, in watts

expectations.hashrate.comment: An optional structure defining hashrate expectations to monitor for

hashrate.low.comment: An optional property to define the low end of expected hashrate, in MH/s

expectations.pools.comment: An optional array of pool definitions of expected pools to send hashrate to

pools.url.comment: The url for a pool that is expected to be configured
pools.user.comment: The user for a pool that is expected to be configured

expectations.temps.comment: An optional structure defining temperature expectations to monitor for

temps.maxenv.comment: An optional property to define the maximum allowed ambient temperature range, in degrees celsius
temps.maxboard.comment: An optional property to define the maximum allowed board temperature range, in degrees celsius
temps.maxchip.comment: An optional property to define the maximum allowed chip temperature range, in degrees celsius

expectations.fans.comment: An optional structure defining fan expectations to monitor for

fans.low.comment: An optional property to define the low end of expected fan speed, in RPMs
fans.high.comment: An optional property to define the high end of expected fan speed, in RPMS

width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 320
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHot.comment: The color to show the temperature exceeding the hot threshold expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorDangerous.comment: The color to show the temperature exceeding the dangerous threshold expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashrateBox.comment: The color of the border, average line and label backgrounds for the hashrate graph expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashratePlot.comment: The color to plot each hashrate value within the hashrate graph expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashrateMA.comment: The color to draw the hashrate moving average line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
